2024-06-14T23-29-39Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

2024-06-15T00-38-17Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

2024-06-14T23-29-39Z.workflow:
jobs:
  deploy:
    name: Deploy
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: 20
      - uses: ruby/setup-ruby@v1
        with:
          ruby-version: 3.1
          bundler: 'latest'
      - name: Install Shopify CLI
        run: npm install -g @shopify/cli @shopify/theme
      - name: Select Store
        id: select-store
        uses: actions/github-script@v6
        with:
          result-encoding: string
          script: |
            return 'sp-home-test'
      - name: Select Token
        id: select-token
        uses: actions/github-script@v6
        with:
          result-encoding: string
          script: |
            return 'shptka_5a287548322834b94b68e577aaf85239'
      - name: Update the live theme
        id: update-theme
        env:
          SHOPIFY_FLAG_STORE: ${{ steps.select-store.outputs.result }}
          SHOPIFY_CLI_THEME_TOKEN: ${{ steps.select-token.outputs.result }}
          SHOPIFY_FLAG_PATH: './theme'
        run: shopify theme push --live
name: 'Production'
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
    paths:
      - 'theme/**'

2024-06-15T00-38-17Z.workflow:
jobs:
  deploy:
    name: Deploy
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: 20
      - uses: ruby/setup-ruby@v1
        with:
          ruby-version: 3.1
          bundler: 'latest'
      - name: Install Shopify CLI
        run: npm install -g @shopify/cli @shopify/theme
      - name: Select Store
        id: select-store
        uses: actions/github-script@v6
        with:
          result-encoding: string
          script: |
            return 'sp-home-test'
      - name: Select Token
        id: select-token
        uses: actions/github-script@v6
        with:
          result-encoding: string
          script: |
            return 'shptka_5a287548322834b94b68e577aaf85239'
      - name: Update the live theme
        id: update-theme
        env:
          SHOPIFY_FLAG_STORE: ${{ steps.select-store.outputs.result }}
          SHOPIFY_CLI_THEME_TOKEN: ${{ steps.select-token.outputs.result }}
          SHOPIFY_FLAG_PATH: './theme'
        run: shopify theme push --verbose --allow-live --live
name: 'Production'
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
    paths:
      - 'theme/**'
